response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $800,000 to you, which makes it a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its unparalleled quality and potential impact on your business or personal life, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000.

This offer represents a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value of the product and its market potential, providing you with an excellent opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive price. I understand that you may have specific considerations or requirements, so please let me know if there's anything I can assist you with to make this transaction smooth and beneficial for both parties.

I look forward to hearing from you soon and hope to facilitate this exciting acquisition for you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
